item.title: Hello
item.description: Hello world post This is a hello world post just test how would one post on Hugo This is an inline \(a^*=x-b^*\) equation. These are block equations: \[a^*=x-b^*\] \[ a^*=x-b^* \] \[ a^*=x-b^* \] These are also block equations: $$a^*=x-b^*$$ $$ a^*=x-b^* $$ $$ a^*=x-b^* $$ \[ \begin{aligned} KL(\hat{y} || y) &= \sum_{c=1}^{M}\hat{y}_c \log{\frac{\hat{y}_c}{y_c}} \\ JS(\hat{y} || y) &= \frac{1}{2}(KL(y||\frac{y+\hat{y}}{2}) + KL(\hat{y}||\frac{y+\hat{y}}{2})) \end{aligned} \]
